result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael R Fleres was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts to a Child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Banned from all Target Stores. No unsupervised contact with any juveniles. Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with CCW or her family.
Sex offender evaluation and any treatment that is recommended. Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

charges.descr: Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts to a Child

  Def waived reading of Information.  Def by Counsel enters a plea of NG.  Motions due w/i 20 days; bail continued.

  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing signed.
Status conference on April 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
  - Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with C.C.W.
  - Defendant shall not have any unsupervised contact with juveniles.
  - Defendant shall not be at any Target.
  - Defendant shall not be at any location that is west of Hwy 113 and north of Meadows of Sixmile Creek and that is in the Village of Waunakee, as indicated on map given defendant.

  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.
